body: I'm curious how everyone first discovered Avicus. Was it through a friend (viva voce), a server list, a YouTube video, an advertisement, or something else?
body_tagged: I'm curious how everyone first discovered Avicus. Was it through a friend (viva voce), a server list, a YouTube video, an advertisement, or something else?
title: How did you learn about Avicus?

replies.body: Porky showed me long long ago. Stayed ever since ;)
replies.body_tagged: Porky showed me long long ago. Stayed ever since ;)

replies.body: My brother discovered it on a server list, I believe, and then my sister, him, and I started playing.
replies.body_tagged: My brother discovered it on a server list, I believe, and then my sister, him, and I started playing.

replies.body: I and some friends were looking for a server to record on and (I hope I get tagging right) {tag=888f6c68ddbd43db98898fc528921691} and {tag=e34423301b63402f8ace310c1417d44e} showed myself and {tag=2748cb22eb1e44dbae5ec4c2bc4ece1c} Avicus that they have been playing on for a while. On my old terminated channel I recorded and uploaded Avicus at least once a week. Those were the days...
replies.body_tagged: I and some friends were looking for a server to record on and (I hope I get tagging right) FatherHurl and  LemonLime_x showed myself and  Glesmon Avicus that they have been playing on for a while. On my old terminated channel I recorded and uploaded Avicus at least once a week. Those were the days...

replies.body: On the week that I was getting Minecraft, I asked my friend for cool servers that we can play on and he gave me this server. When it came to the day, I went on this server first and had a blast with my friend :D. I never expected to get this far, tbh. I gave my skipp18 account to my mom so she can use it for therapy for the kids she can worked with, so I got this account for Christmas that year :).
replies.body_tagged: On the week that I was getting Minecraft, I asked my friend for cool servers that we can play on and he gave me this server. When it came to the day, I went on this server first and had a blast with my friend :D. I never expected to get this far, tbh. I gave my skipp18 account to my mom so she can use it for therapy for the kids she can worked with, so I got this account for Christmas that year :).

replies.body: Well back when the server was very big, like almost as big as my brothers weight, I saw the server (MCZone) at the time has Survival Games, The Walls and Sky Wars, the 3 gamemodes I was really into 3 years ago so I joined and really enjoyed the server, met some new people and had a great time. Now I am here! Who would've known. xd

replies.body:
Watched BajanCanadian and Sundee
Watch them play Earth Games and like Equinox or something
Played Earth Games for a while
Got bored and searched up team PvP
Bam
Don't know how accurate the date on my profile is, but I swear I remember joining earlier than that. But that also means I first joined OCN before Avicus lol

replies.body: Around 3 years ago my two best friends at the time and I were trying to find a good server to play on. One of my friends(Who is no longer friends with me) said she found an awesome server. We all played on McZone and they grew out of it, but I never did.

replies.body: {tag=309bd365f87b4077b5621aebdc7d3db3} was a walls bae? ;o anyway if I remember right I was banned on a different walls server 3+ years ago (getting close to 4 years on Avicus o.o) and someone asked what the IP to that server was, so I told them... Well because I said a IP I got banned by the console. So I started looking for another walls server, and I found wallsmc.com and here I am, I never would have guessed this.

replies.body: around 3 years ago me and my best friend wanted to play survival games because we were really into that gamemode and stumbled upon mczone and fell in love with Nexus. Sadly we left for a gap year/year and a half because personal issues and when we joined it was gone. We had loads of fun playing Nebula after :P

replies.body: I've been here since MCzone days. A few friends of mine mentioned the server and I never thought much about it. I gave it a shot and now I love it. :D I know I'm not active but I try my best. :DDD

replies.body:
I was like nine and I had gotten MC a few months back and I wanted to start playing multiplayer and my friend played the game as well. He told me he was "famous" a had a YT channel with over 10k (he was an attention seeker and had low self esteem all through his childhood and I was friends with him because I felt bad for him, and then the popular kids started to pity him and now he's a dick). So he told me this server was for famous MC youtubers and I saw right through him but an argument was pointless because he just wouldn't listen, so I just came on to here and played SG for 4 straight hours. I didn't win a single time because at the time I sucked and was also getting like 4 FPS, but I got better, joined a couple of other servers, and I ended up here.

i was 9 ok

replies.body: I searched "South Korean minecraft servers" on google and it led me to this page:http://minecraft-mp.com/country/south-korea/ So I tried all 27 servers, but only a few caught my attention, and one of those were Avicus. At first, I though Avicus was a South Korean server, but when I learned that it was located in America, I was like "ohhhhhhhhhh :O" And I stayed ever since :D
replies.body_tagged: I searched "South Korean minecraft servers" on google and it led me to this page:http://minecraft-mp.com/country/south-korea/ So I tried all 27 servers, but only a few caught my attention, and one of those were Avicus. At first, I though Avicus was a South Korean server, but when I learned that it was located in America, I was like "ohhhhhhhhhh :O" And I stayed ever since :D

Already did this but I thought I’d give a better explanation.

My friend and his friend wanted to play Walls. They found this server, then my friend gave it to me, I started playing alot and got really into the server. replies.body:
The year was 2014, i had just moved to Devon and befriended a Peruvian Llama rider (if you know who it is..well done). He was crazy, insane and manic, he introduced me to something called teamspeak. I entered, fear in my eyes and followed this mans instructions. He took me to a place called avicus and forced me to talk to the hyped up personality of Merp...A week later i find myself on the actual server playing with OscarElNana (FriendlyModOscar etc...) the Llama rider. I have been trapped ever since, waiting for the Lord Kylo to return and free me.

I think i took this a bit too seriously.
replies.body_tagged:
